title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6700.4 - Inspection and copying of public employment records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6700.4 - Inspection and copying of public employment records

State Regulations

Bona fide members of the news media shall be entitled to
inspect and to receive a certified copy of those public employment records
required to be made available to them by law[FN*] upon filing a written notice
of intention to examine public employment records, as prescribed by the

Comptroller, with the fiscal officer of the commission. Such notice should be
received by the fiscal officer at least one business day prior to the date
access is sought in order that the records may be compiled for the applicant. Notice forms prescribed by the Comptroller are available at the offices of the
commission. [FN*] Public Officers Law, ยง88(1) (g)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9

6700.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
